alert.note: Alert for Chester; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:36AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Henderson and northeastern Chester Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 535 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jacks Creek, or 8 miles east of Henderson, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Jacks Creek, Reagan, Mifflin, Scotts Hill, Enville, Huron, Palestine, Sand Ridge, Roby, Cabo, Middle Fork, Hinson Springs, Taylors Crossing and Shady Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
